meanings.sent1: He kept overtightening the screws until they broke.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to overtighten the lid on the jar.
meanings.sent3: She joked that he was overtightening his belt to impress everyone.
meanings.sent4: The grip of fear overtightening her heart as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rope overtightening around the tree was etched in his mind.

meanings.sent1: The mechanic was overtightening the bolts on the car engine.
meanings.sent2: You shouldn't overtighten the straps on the backpack.
meanings.sent3: He regretted overtightening the lid on the jar when he couldn't open it later.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was like overtightening a guitar string to its breaking point.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of overtightening the knot in the rope made her hands tremble.
